means: 装饰，佩带( adorn的过去式和过去分词 )

sentence.Network_en: The walls were adorned with paintings.
And his coat was adorned with a flamboyant bunch of flowers.
sentence.Network_cn: 他的外套上面装饰着一束艳丽刺目的鲜花.

sentence.Network_en: The apt citations and poetic gems have adorned his speeches.
sentence.Network_cn: 贴切的引语和珠玑般的诗句为他的演说词增添文采.

PerfectNetExp.abs: The medals are adorned with Native Canadian icons and designs of killer whales ., 奖牌用加拿大本地的图标和鲸鱼的捕杀的象征而做装饰.
stroll in a small stream , spray adorned with our road ;, 漫步在小溪边 , 浪花装饰着我们的路;
The " lost " guitar is adorned with a heart pierced by arrow and a self portrait ., 这把 " 遗失 " 的吉他上雕饰了一颗用箭穿过的心和一幅自画像.
Her hat was adorned with a plume ., 她帽子上饰着羽毛.

list.abs: adornment and its derivatives including adornment art , adornment beauty and adornment style form a series of interrelated terms .装饰，以及从中衍生出来装饰艺术、装饰美、装饰风格等是一系列相互关联的专业术语。
QB/T 1689－2006《贵金属饰品术语》 -... ... 3．2．2．4耳插(耳钉) otic insert 3．2．3颈饰 neck adornment 3．2．3．1项链 neckla…
严净道场adorned by excellent characteristics 相好庄严adorned with flowers 健.
恒爱珍珠 ... 手链 Bracelet 饰品 Adorn article 项链 Necklace.
首页-MISSBOHE-淘宝网 ... GLASSES（ 墨镜类） ADORN ARTICLE（ 饰品类） SILK SCARVES（ 丝巾类）.

entry.def: If something adorns a place or an object, it makes it look more beautiful.

example.ex: His watercolour designs adorn a wide range of books...
example.tran: 他的水彩设计使许多图书大为生色。

example.ex: Several magnificent oil paintings adorn the walls.
example.tran: 几幅恢宏的油画装点着墙面。

means.word_mean: 1. provided with something intended to increase its beauty or distinction

auth_sentence.content: The following might have adorned the pages of Spenser.
auth_sentence.res_content: The following might have adorned the pages of Spenser.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: The following might have adorned the pages of Spenser.

auth_sentence.content: A butler who would have adorned a bench of bishops.
auth_sentence.res_content: A butler who would have adorned a bench of bishops.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: A butler who would have adorned a bench of bishops.

auth_sentence.content: The suits have adorned four medalists so far.
auth_sentence.res_content: The suits have adorned four medalists so far.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: The suits have adorned four medalists so far.
